Sorry for the late reply,
I am confused, the page I shared mentions:

The patch against Meltdown is kernel only. Docker containers run within the kernel of the host system. This means the resistance against Meltdown depends on the host kernel only.

So from what I can understand, you upgrade the host machine and you are safe, no matter what the docker container has?
